The Ghan Expedition Tour - Darwin to Adelaide Experience a unique journey across Australia, from north to south. Begin with a 3 night 5 star stay in Darwin, where you'll enjoy a Sunset Dinner Cruise and full day tour to experience the stunning Litchfield National Park Waterfalls. Next, join an iconic four-day, all-inclusive rail expedition onboard The Ghan Expedition, taking you to some of the most remote and captivating parts of Australia. Your adventure through the country's vast, varied, and captivating interior will show you the beauty of the Australian outback. Enjoy incredible Off Train Experiences; in the Northern Territory, explore Katherine and Alice Springs, where you'll enjoy a signature dining experience at The Historic Telegraph Station, and in South Australia, stop at Manguri and Coober Pedy before reaching your final destination of Adelaide. Here you'll relax for two days to explore the city and end your journey with a Barossa Food & Wine Experience tour taking you to some of Australia's best wineries. From the stunning outback landscapes to the simple pleasures of South Australia, this trip has got it all! HIGHLIGHTS: • Enjoy a spectacular Sunset Dinner Cruise in Darwin • Be welcomed aboard The Ghan Expedition with light refreshments, barista coffee and sparkling wine • Enjoy a regionally-inspired menu paired with a selection of local wines on board the train • Experience a spectacular dinner under the stars at The Historic Telegraph Station in Alice Springs • Explore Nitmiluk Gorge's powerful natural wonders and rich Indigenous culture • Venture into the underground opal mining town of Coober Pedy • Indulge in a Barossa Food & Wine Experience tour ITINERARY Day 1: Arrive Darwin (3 nights) Day 2: Day at leisure in Darwin then Sunset Dinner Cruise Day 3: Full day tour to Litchfield National Park Days 4-6: Onboard The Ghan Expedition (3 nights) Day 7: Arrive Adelaide (2 nights) Day 8: Full Day Barossa Food & Wine Experience Tour Day 9: departure transfer to Adelaide airport Gold Twin or Single Cabin (8 Nights) Travel Dates: 28 Jun - 6 Jul 26 Twin per person fr $9,299 Single per person fr $10,109 Gold Premium Twin Cabin (8 Nights) Travel Dates: 28 Jun - 6 Jul 26 Twin per person fr $10,599 Note: Departs: Darwin 28 June 2026.
